song.englishname: That's What We Came Here For

english.segment1: We come into Your presence with singing. Come into Your presence with praise. And enter Your gates with thankful hearts. We are going to celebrate
english.segment2: All of heavens waiting. Power is on its way. So we shout hallelujah. Lifting to You a mighty roar of praise
english.segment3: Chorus: You deserve the highest praise. That we can give and more. Lord, we give You our praise. Thats what we came here for
english.segment5: Everything within me reaches out to You. Your power and majesty. Grace and mercy too. Therell be singing and dancing. Hearts and voices raised. You have set Your people free. Now the house is filled with praise. (Chorus)
